short_summary: The Canada Council for the Arts is seeking a supplier for media relations and communications services.
description: The selected Offeror will have the resources necessary to help the Canada Council promote a variety of projects, initiatives, awards, and campaigns.
full_summary:
### Media Relations and Communications Services
#### Request for Standing Offer – #CANADACOUNCIL002COMM-01
#### Publication Date: January 15, 2024
#### Closing Date: February 26, 2024

The Canada Council for the Arts (the Council) is seeking a supplier to provide comprehensive media relations and communications services to promote various projects, initiatives, and campaigns. The selected supplier will collaborate with the Council's Project Authority to develop, implement, and report on media and public relations strategies in local, regional, national, and international contexts.

Key Tasks and Deliverables:

* Provide public and media relations services to promote the Council's activities
* Conduct media monitoring and reporting
* Develop and execute media relations and public engagement strategies
* Collaborate with project teams to harmonize and amplify promotional efforts
* Organize media interviews, press releases, and other marketing materials
* Develop and maintain distribution lists and targeted communication approaches

Language Requirements:

* The supplier must be proficient in both English and French
* Regular communication with French media and support for French-speaking prize winners is required

Working Arrangements:

* The supplier will work primarily with the Council's Communications team
* Meetings with the supplier will be held on an as-and-when-required basis via virtual platforms
* No travel is expected for this project

Evaluation Criteria:

* The supplier's experience in providing media relations and communications services
* Ability to develop and implement effective media and public relations strategies
* Capacity to work collaboratively and provide communication support in both official languages

Purchasing Details:

* The standing offer is open to all qualified suppliers
* Evaluation will be based on the supplier's qualifications and previous experience
* The Council reserves the right to cancel or terminate the standing offer at any stage during the evaluation process

Interested suppliers should submit their proposal in writing to the contact person below by the closing date.

### Contact Information:
* Name: Julie Bolduc
* Email: [julie.bolduc@canadacouncil.ca](mailto:julie.bolduc@canadacouncil.ca)
* Phone Number: (613) 566-4414
* Address: 150 Elgin Street, Ottawa, Ontario, K2P 1L4, Canada

Note:
